Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have the potential to be used in energy conversion technology.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: Most of the studies aimed at modifications of anode concerning various issues such as component degradation, sulfur poisoning, and carbon deposition at high temperatures, hindering its applications at the industrial level.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: Different perovskite structure-related compounds are discussed in this article, which could be possible electrode materials in SOFCs.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: Literature also revealed the successful utilization of various cathode materials in a wide range of temperature in which cobalt-based materials exhibits higher conductivity than cobalt-free once.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: The selection of initial composition, dopants addition in different electrodes with critical challenges inherent to this material family have been assessed herein which play a vital role in enhanced electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: The other aim of this review article is to provide some useful recommendations and prospective directions for designing future electrode materials of SOFCs.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: The review analysis is done based on different processing parameters and their effect on thermal expansion coefficient, electrical conductivity, mechanical and electrochemical properties, etc.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion

Sentencas: In a nutshell, a detailed overview is critically analyzed for energy conversion and storage applications, which can open many gateways towards the advancement of SOFCs.
Titulo: Recent advancements, doping strategies and the future perspective of perovskite-based solid oxide fuel cells for energy conversion
